Name: Animal Pirate Ship Mount
Desc:
[Master Level: 1]
Ride on an Animal Pirate Ship that can glide.

Desc.Old:
[Master Level: 1]
Ride on an Animal Pirate Ship that can glide. Double-click your destination on the World Map and you will fly automatically toward it along the navigation route. (Auto flight is available only on certain continents, including Victoria Island. You can expand your Smart Mount-permitted continents by buying Flight Permits from Instructor Irvine.)
Desc.New:
[Master Level: 1]
Ride on an Animal Pirate Ship that can glide.

H.Old: DEF: +10, MSPD: 170, Auto Pilot MSPD: Very Fast, Jump: 120
